title: OR NFLteamsSeasons
description: List of NFL teams that contains the stats, players and coach for a specific season

city.title: The city Schema
city.description: City that a team plays in

coach.title: The coach Schema
coach.description: First name and last name of the coach for that season

player_id.title: The player_id Schema
player_id.description: Unique identifying number that represents one player

team_id.title: The team_id Schema
team_id.description: Unique identifying number that represents one team

gameswon.title: The gameswon Schema
gameswon.description: Number of games a team has won in the specified season

teamname.title: The teamname Schema
teamname.description: Name of the NFL team. Usually consists of a city name followed by their nickname

gameslost.title: The gameslost Schema
gameslost.description: Number of games a team has lost in the specified season

pointsdifferential.title: The pointsdifferential Schema
pointsdifferential.description: Difference between acheived points and lost points

pointsscoredbyteam.title: The pointsscoredbyteam Schema
pointsscoredbyteam.description: Amount of points a team has achieved in specified season

pointsscoredbyopposition.title: The pointsscoredbyopposition Schema
pointsscoredbyopposition.description: Amount of points other teams have achieved playing against this team in the specified season
